roleset.name: take advantage of, like a sponge
roleset.note: MOOCH-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from mooch.01-v)

example.name: args0, 2
example.text: She mooches off me , comes over uninvited , and saw my pic on my desk top when my hair was really short and curled and said what was I thinking and it looked really bad .
